column1: Local Foods////I may get my Oakland card yanked for saying this
column2: but the chicken sandwich is better than Bakesale Betty. Actual Houstoners who don't know what I'm talking about
column3: Bakesale Betty is a famous Chicken Sandwich place in Oakland
column4: CA where people stand in line forever for what had been the best chicken sandwich I'd had before having the one at Local Foods. That may not mean much to you
column5: but all of my Cali friends reading this are considering buying plane tickets and are calculating if the 3 hour flight is shorter than the line at BBs.
